mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS_USER ( ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, BUSINESS_NO, PHONE, ALT_PHONE, BIZ_DOC_PATH, CATEGORY, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( BUSINESS_USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dto.username}, #{dto.password}, #{dto.name}, #{dto.businessNo}, #{dto.phone}, #{dto.altPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.category}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
